name: Amount derecognised for capital purposes
description:
Capital purposes derecognition amount is an amount for significant risk transfer securitisation that shall include the carrying amount of the financial assets recognised for accounting purposes but de-recognised for prudential purposes because the institution is treating them as securitisation positions for capital purposes in accordance with Articles 109, 243 and 244 CRR.

It can be used to report the amount derecognised for capital purposes in FINREP.
